edu.neu.ccis.sms.config

Class ConfigurationLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.neu.ccis.sms.config.ConfigurationLoader

  • public class ConfigurationLoader
extends Object
    Load customized terminology for an individual web application instance as CompositeConfiguration, in form of properties from xml configuration sources. Can read properties from multiple XML configuration files. Expects the path of configuration xml in an environment variable EnvKeys.CONFIG_XML_PATH_ENV_VAR. Usage of multiple configuration files can be indicated by environment variable EnvKeys.CONFIG_XML_PATH_ENV_VAR.
    Since:
    May 11, 2015
    Version:
    SMS 1.0
    Author:
    Swapnil Gupta

    • Method Detail

      • loadConfiguration

        public org.apache.commons.configuration.CompositeConfiguration loadConfiguration()
        Load application terminology from all the configuration files(s) for an individual application instance in CompositeConfiguration. Currently supports XML configuration files only, because of better support for customizations in form of multi-level hierarchies.
        Returns:
        composite configuration for an individual application instance

      • addConfigurationsFromSources

        private void addConfigurationsFromSources(org.apache.commons.configuration.CompositeConfiguration terminologyConfig)
                                   throws org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException
        Add configurations from all the configurations sources specified in the root configuration file.
        Parameters:
        terminologyConfig - CompositeConfiguration object containing all the configuration properties
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.configuration.ConfigurationException - the configuration exception

      • getConfigXMLPathFromEnvironemnt

        private String getConfigXMLPathFromEnvironemnt()
        Get the main configuration xml file for an individual application instance from environment variable EnvKeys.CONFIG_XML_PATH_ENV_VAR
        Returns:
        the configuration xml path for individual application instance

      • getMultipleConfigFileStatus

        private String getMultipleConfigFileStatus()
        Get the environment variable indicating that the main configuration file, contains additional configuration files from environment variable EnvKeys.MULTI_CONFIG_FILES_ENV_VAR.
        Returns:
        value for the environment variable indicating usage of multiple configuration files
